areYouSureDeleteProduct: Are you sure you want to delete the item "{{productName}}"? This action is permanent.
areYouSureDeleteRule: Are you sure you want to delete this automation rule? This action is permanent.
areYouSureRemoveUser: Are you sure you want to remove "{{username}}" from the team?
areYouSureDeleteShop: Are you sure you want to delete the shop "{{shopName}}"? This is permanent and cannot be undone.
deleteDataExportHint: Reminder: Before deleting, you can export your data. Items can be exported from the 'Products' tab, and orders can be exported from the 'Sale Assistant' > 'Data' tab.
areYouSureDeleteForm: Are you sure you want to delete the form "{{formName}}"? This will not delete submitted data, but the action is permanent.
areYouSureDeleteSection: Are you sure you want to delete the training section "{{sectionTitle}}"? This is permanent.
areYouSureDeleteMenuItem: Are you sure you want to delete the menu item "{{itemTitle}}"?
areYouSureDeleteButton: Are you sure you want to delete the button "{{buttonTitle}}"?
areYouSureDeleteOrder: Are you sure you want to permanently delete Order #{{orderId}}?
businessNameDescription: The official name of your business.
assistantNicknameDescription: Give your AI a short name.
deepThinkingDescription: For complex queries needing deep reasoning.
upgradeToPro: Upgrade to a Pro plan to use this model.
conversationalOrderingDescription: Allow AI to create orders and book services directly in chat.
featureDisabledByAdmin: Note: This feature has been disabled globally by the platform admin.
responseDelayDescription: Simulate a human-like delay before the AI responds.
assistantPersonalityInfo: This is the core instruction that defines the AI's behavior, tone, and rules. Be clear and specific about its purpose and limitations.
assistantPersonalityPlaceholder: e.g., You are a friendly and helpful assistant for an online clothing store...
assistantPersonalityBehavior: Define the AI's core behavior and purpose.
trainAiDescription: Provide information and context to train your AI. Changes are saved automatically.
noTrainingSections: No training sections have been added yet.
clickAddNewSection: Click "Add a New Section" below to start.
addBlankSection: Add a blank section with your own title
sectionLimitReached: Section limit ({{sectionLimit}}) reached for your plan.
upgradeForMoreSections: Upgrade to a Pro plan to add more.
autoGeneratedItemDescription: This is generated automatically from your Item Catalog. The AI uses this to answer item-specific questions. (Read-only)
noProductData: No item data available. Add items in the "Products" tab.
upgradeForMoreRules: Upgrade to a Pro plan to add more rules.
selectOrAddRule: Select a rule from the left, or add a new one.
clickToUploadAttachment: Click to upload an Image, GIF, or Video
facebookConnectDescription: Connect your Facebook page to enable the assistant for comments and messages.
shareThisLink: Share this link with your customers to let them interact with your AI assistant.
customURLDescription: Create a memorable, branded link for your bot. (Pro feature)
upgradeForCustomURL: Upgrade to Pro to use custom URLs.
customerEntryPointDescription: Choose what the customer sees first when they open the chat link.
persistentMenuDescription: Add menu items that are always visible to the customer in the chat.
bulkActionsPro: Bulk Actions are a Pro feature
upgradeForMoreProducts: Upgrade to a Pro plan to add more items.
catalogEmptyHint: Click "Add New Item" or use "Bulk Actions" to get started.
batchProductImportDesc: Upload a CSV file to add multiple items at once. Ensure the file follows the template format.
selectFileToImport: Please select a file to import.
csvEmpty: CSV file is empty or contains only a header.
csvImportError:
Import failed. Please fix the following errors in your CSV file:

{{errors}}
noValidProducts: No valid items found to import.
aiPhotoStudioPro: Upgrade to a Pro plan to use the AI Photo Studio.
descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A handcrafted ceramic mug, perfect for your morning coffee...
assignSpecificForm: Assign a specific order form for this item.
fillRequiredFields: Please fill in at least Name, Price, and Stock/Capacity.
pleaseUploadImage: Please upload a valid image file.
imageSizeLimit: Image file size must be under 2MB.
provideProductNameAndKeywords: Please provide an item name and some keywords to generate a description.
failedToGenerateDescription: Failed to generate description. Please try again.
keywordsPlaceholder: Keywords: e.g., soft cotton, breathable, summer
orderFormsDescription: Create and manage forms for customers to place orders or submit inquiries.
gettingStartedDescription: Complete these steps to get the most out of your AI assistant.
addFirstProductSubtext: Fill your catalog so the AI can answer questions about them.
configureAIPersonalitySubtext: Give your assistant a unique voice and purpose.
createOrderFormSubtext: Build forms for customers to place orders easily.
connectFacebookPageSubtext: Enable the AI on your page for messages and comments.
automatedConversionFlowDesc: Customize automated conversations for orders and service bookings. These flows are triggered by keywords or menu buttons.
productFlowDesc: Enable this if you sell physical products. This system helps customers check status, update details, or cancel orders automatically.
serviceFlowDesc: Enable this if you offer services or appointments. This system helps clients manage their bookings. The 'Manage Booking' button text will be consistent across the platform.
noFormsCreated: No forms have been created yet.
noFormsHint: Click 'Add New Form' to begin creating your first order form.
defaultOnlineFormHint: This form will be used for 'Order Now' quick replies and when an item-specific form is not assigned.
defaultOfflineFormHint: Set a default form to speed up offline order creation, or allow the seller to choose each time.
newFormCreated: New form created and opened in the editor.
formLimitReached: Form limit reached for your plan. Upgrade to create more.
upgradeForMoreForms: Upgrade to a Pro plan for unlimited forms.
usernameSame: Username is the same as the current one.
usernameUpdateSuccess: Username updated. The app will now reload.
deleteConfirmationMismatch: Confirmation text does not match. Deletion cancelled.
automatedFlowsInfoTitle: How These Flows Affect Your AI's Behavior
automatedFlowsInfoOffPara1: If you disable all flows, your AI assistant will act as an information provider. It will not attempt to manage or create any orders/bookings.
automatedFlowsInfoOffPara2: When a customer asks 'how to buy', the AI will rely on your 'Train AI' data (especially Physical Store lists) to guide them. This is ideal for brands that sell through physical locations and not online.
automatedFlowsInfoOnPara1: Enabling these flows gives your AI the ability to automatically handle customer requests like checking order status, updating details, or canceling an order. This automates customer service for online sales.
paymentIntelligenceDesc: Automatically link payment screenshots sent in chat to the correct order.
howItWorksDesc: When this feature is active, the AI will enter a special 'listening' mode for a set time after a conversational order is created. Any image sent by the customer during this window is automatically attached to their order as payment proof.
importantNoticeDesc: This feature's purpose is to organize and attach screenshots to the correct order to make your verification process easier. The AI does NOT verify the payment or detect if the screenshot is fake. The final responsibility for confirming the payment in your bank account and verifying the proof rests entirely with you, the seller. We are not responsible for any fraud or errors in payment verification.
timeWindowDesc: The duration after an order is placed where the bot will wait for a payment screenshot (e.g., 15 minutes).
statusOnProofDesc: The status to set an order to after a valid payment proof is submitted.
confirmationMessageDesc: This message is sent to the customer after their payment proof is successfully received. Use `{{orderId}}` as a placeholder for the order ID.
trialDaysLeft: You have {{daysLeft}} days left in your trial.
trialEnded: Your trial has ended. Please upgrade to continue using the service.
dashboardOverview: Here's an overview of your shop's performance.
dashboardUnavailableBrand: The Brand plan focuses on core features. Upgrade to Pro for advanced analytics and sales dashboards.
marketingAssistantPro: Generate social media posts, ad copy, and promotion ideas automatically. This feature is available on the Pro plan.
contentPlaceholder: Your AI-generated content will appear here.
unlockOfflinePOSDesc: The Offline Sale (POS) feature allows you to create orders manually, perfect for in-person sales or phone orders. This feature is available on the Pro plan.
clickProductToStart: Click on a product to start an order.
noFormsForOffline: No order forms have been created. Please create one in the 'Forms' tab to proceed.
receiptCustomizationDesc: Customize the look and feel of your printed order receipts.
customFooterPlaceholder: e.g., Thank you for your purchase! Follow us on Facebook!
standardPageDesc: For office printers, PDF, or email.
viewAndManageOrders: View, manage, and export all your order data.
noMatchingOrders: No orders found matching your filters.
dataRetentionWarning: Your shop data is older than your plan's {{retentionDays}}-day limit. Older data will be hidden soon and scheduled for permanent deletion.
dataRetentionEndingSoon: Your oldest shop data will soon reach your plan's {{retentionDays}}-day retention limit.
salesDashboardOverview: A detailed look at your sales performance.
areYouSureDeleteCategory: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{{categoryName}}"?
thisWillRemoveIt: This will remove it from all associated items but will not delete the items themselves.
pleaseProvideReason: Please provide a reason for the adjustment.
addNotes: Add private notes about this customer...
noConversationsFound: No conversations found for this filter.
selectConversation: Select a conversation to view it here.
areYouSureDeleteConvo: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This is permanent.
unitsSoldTooltip: Total quantity sold in the selected period.
revenueTooltip: Total revenue generated by this SKU in the period.
profitMarginTooltip: The profit margin percentage for this SKU.
returnRateTooltip: Percentage of units returned against total units shipped (sold + returned).
sellThruTooltip: Sell-Through Rate (Units Sold / (Units Sold + Inv. Rem.)).
trendTooltip: Sales trend compared to the previous equivalent period.
saleSpeedTooltip: Average days it takes to sell one unit.
noSalesData: No sales data for this period.
allProductsSold: All products with stock had sales in this period.
unlockAdvancedAnalyticsDesc: Upgrade to the Pro plan to access detailed inventory analysis, category performance, and individual SKU performance metrics.
askForNewPhone_label: Ask for New Phone Number Prompt
generatedFromTrainAssistantDesc: These buttons are created from topics in your 'Train Assistant' section. To edit them, go to the training editor.
manageOrderButtonContextDesc: These buttons are managed in: Chat Assistant > Automations > Automated Sales & Booking Flows.
paymentMethodsButtonContextDesc: This button is managed in: Sale Assistant > Payments & Receipts.
topicButtonsContextDesc: To edit, go to: Chat Assistant > Train Assistant
presetSystemButtonsDesc: Customize the text and behavior of common, system-generated quick reply buttons.
presetSystemButtonsDescV2: Customize the default English text and auto-replies for system buttons. These edits will apply to all customers, regardless of their language.
talkToHumanDesc: This button allows customers to request speaking with a person, pausing the AI.
browseByCategoryDesc: This button lets customers see a list of your product categories to explore.
noCategoriesFoundPreview: No categories found. Add categories to your items in the 'Products' tab to see them here.
contextDescriptionHint: Explain what these locations are for (e.g., 'Official showrooms for sales', 'Service centers for repairs'). The AI will use this context.
noLocationsAdded: No locations have been added yet.
dragAndDropCSV: Drag & drop your CSV file here, or click to select.
shopCurrencyDesc: This currency will be used for all product prices, orders, and dashboard analytics for this shop.
automatedConversionLimitReachedDesc: Congratulations! You've reached the {{limit}} automated conversions limit for your {{plan}} plan. Choose an option to continue.
upgradeAndContinueDesc: Instantly get the limits of the {{plan}} plan. You'll be billed for the new plan on your next cycle.
continueWithAssistedDesc: Stay on your current plan. The AI will collect customer info but a human must finalize the sale.
upgradeScheduledSuccess: Upgrade scheduled! Your new limits are active immediately.
instantUpgradeLockedTooltip: This change is committed because you received the upgrade benefits early.
